## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:**	[Solyc04g076810](https://solgenomics.net/locus/Solyc04g076810/view)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>SlCIPK7</u>
- **Gene Name:** CBL interacting protein kinase 7
- **Genome:** [Tomato Genome version SL4.0](https://solgenomics.net/organism/solanum_lycopersicum/genome)
- **Species:** *Solanum lycopersicum*

## Functional Descriptions:
   - **SlCIPK7**, the functional homolog of CIPK8 in tomato (Solanum lycopersicum), plays a similar role in ABA-responsive stomatal movement.
   - Consistent with the homologous function between Arabidopsis CIPK8 and **SlCIPK7**, ABA-hypersensitive stomatal closure in cipk8-1 was rescued to the level of wild type by exogenous expression of **SlCIPK7**.
   - The **SlCIPK7** mutants are more sensitive to ABA-induced stomatal closure and more tolerant to drought.
   - The results demonstrated that functional loss of **SlCIPK7** resulted in ABA-hypersensitive stomatal closure and promoted drought tolerance.
   - Genomic editing of **SlCIPK7** results in more drought-tolerant tomato, making it a good candidate for germplasm improvement.

## Function-related keywords:
   - [drought](/tags/drought/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[tolerance](/tags/tolerance/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[aba](/tags/aba/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[drought-tolerance](/tags/drought-tolerance/),&nbsp;&nbsp;[stomatal](/tags/stomatal/)
